metadata.name: ABSTRACT FACES
metadata.description:
Long ago, before humans roamed the Earth, a mystical civilization thrived. These magical beings, known as la üëÅÔ∏è Raza, had a unique mission: to spread love through the power of art. Childlike and playful, yet brimming with wisdom, they communicated with humans through telepathy and music. Indeed, they were all musicians who loved to dance.

Five Original (OG) Light Beings arrived on Earth, each with their own distinct tasks. When united, they called themselves the Abstract Faces.

With the Purchase of this NFT you will also get the Print Phygital Edition.
